name: Gerard Dacudao
text: We need another Manila.  A parallel Manila facing the Pacific.  That's the solution as there is absolutely no urban planning in MM to allow more MRTs, more EDSAs - shorter wait times for these poor folks.

source_obj.text: We need another Manila.  A parallel Manila facing the Pacific.  That's the solution as there is absolutely no urban planning in MM to allow more MRTs, more EDSAs - shorter wait times for these poor folks.
